raw_comment: there is an upward trend in the graph. It seems that 15-24 year olds tend to be more optimistic than 40+ year olds. Additionally, there is not a strong correlation between how developed a country is and their positivity; some developed countries are quite pessimistic, and some developing countries are very optimistic.
ace_sentences: The graph shows an upward trend.
People who are 15-24 years old tend to be more optimistic than people who are older than 40 years.
There is no strong correlation between the development level of a country and the positivity of the country.
Some developed countries are quite pessimistic.
Some developing countries are very optimistic.
